column4: i have kubuntu 5.04, kde 3.4, my sound system doesn't work.. i tested it in control center.. it recognizes the sound card but doesn't play any sound.. i tried to change the sound engines and it didn't work. amaroK and XMMS don't work either

i have kubuntu 5.04, kde 3.4, my sound system doesn't work.. i tested it in control center.. it recognizes the sound card but doesn't play any sound.. i tried to change the sound engines and it didn't work. amaroK and XMMS don't work either
can you give us some more information rather than just repeating yourself?
